content: One LOT - two coinsCasascius .1 (Peeled )  and 1/2 Oz Platinum 50 USD Proof with box and papersFrontBackSTARTING BID: 0.04 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.002 BTC AUCTION END TIME: Sunday JUNE 6th, 7PM New York timeCOUNT DOWN TIMER: PAYMENT DUE WITHIN 24 HOURS OF AUCTION ENDSNIPING: ANY BID MADE IN THE LAST 10 MINUTES WILL EXTEND THE AUCTION 10 MINUTES BEYOND THE AUCTION END. IF WITHIN THOSE 10 MINUTES, A NEW BID IS MADE, 10 MINUTES WILL BE ADDED TO THE AUCTION FROM THE TIME OF THAT BID PAYMENT: BITCOIN BTC  ONLY, Address will be sent to the winner.SHIPPING: Free. ESCROW: MJ.More info:   0.1 Cas, start bits: 1AgwRbYA  0.1 Casascius COIN private key is still attached to the sticker (sticker was not peeled completely)  0.1 Casascius COIN has been REDEEMED  Platinum 50 USD Proof has never been taken out of it's capsule
